reviewText: Always well down fells like visiting with old friends.
Same thing a great way to watch something worthwhile. Remember this was once your evening entertainment.
I like it nice to see good clean tv again
I got these for my collection. I will love these forever.
There is a certain pleasure in seeing episodes of what TV was like before violence took over.  Also nice to see Ricky Nelson as a lad.
They don't make them like this any more and never will.  We have all three sets and love them all.

Great old episodes with original commercials from Kodak and Coca-Cola.  Many young actors appeared here first and then later in sitcoms of the 60's like My Three Sons.  Other actors who would later appear in The Andy Griffith Show, Green Acres, etc. also have key roles. Relax and enjoy these with the whole family...good, clean, family fun made when we could leave our doors unlocked and leave the keys in the car ignition.

The program content is outstanding and very entertaining.  These shows deserve a better issue than they have received.  The rendition is poor based on the fact that the source is black and white film.  Nothing should be issued on DVD-Rs that often do not even play.
It was suppose to be about there childhood,they're adults.
I LOVE these shows that were truly funny and good natured, but they won't always play on my machine! I hope someone puts them out with better quality!
Love this old show!  Fun to relax and watch a quality show from a time when life moved at a slower pace, and foul language, lewdness, and sexual innuendo weren't the focus in family comedies.
